name: Search activites on Google+
description:
Add search term as node and fetch data.

You need an access token provided by Google, get one from https://code.google.com/apis/console/
Enter your access token into the key-parameter in the Generic Tab.

For further information on  access keys (OAuth for Google+ is not yet provided by Facepager) see https://developers.google.com/+/api/oauth

For further information about Google+ API see https://developers.google.com/+/api/latest/
